title: What Excuse
text:
I’d like to take myself and you
To another star
To a better star

I’d like to take myself and you all
To outer space
Quiet, calm space

I’d like to make a world of change
Build it all today
Rule it all today

I’d like to make a world of change
Start with me and you
All of me and you

But I’m not a perfect man
I’m not a perfect man
Yeah I’m not a perfect man
I’m not a perfect man!

Keep it slow
